alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 7:20PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Eddy and southern Lea Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 720 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Loving, or 18 miles east of Carlsbad, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eunice, Monument, Eunice Airport, Oil Center and Halfway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Southern Lea County
